description: This file provides utility functions to interface with the OpenAI API for a healthcare AI project. It includes functions to send chat messages to OpenAI's chat completions API, with specific implementations for dual-agent interactions where one agent gathers patient information and the other provides medical advice. The file handles authentication via API keys and supports mock responses for development.

methods.name: _headers()
methods.description: Generates HTTP headers with authorization token if API key is available.

methods.name: str _post_chat(messages, model: str = "gpt-4o-mini", temperature: float = 0.2)
methods.description: Sends chat messages to OpenAI API or returns a mock response when API key is missing.

methods.name: Tuple[str,str] get_dual_agent_responses(user_message: str)
methods.description: Main function that coordinates interactions with two specialized healthcare agents.

ctags.name: _post_chat
ctags.pattern: /^async def _post_chat(messages, model: str = "gpt-4o-mini", temperature: float = 0.2) -> str:$/
